message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible product, and I believe it's worth every penny. I'm willing to let it go for $1200000.
Thank you for offering me the product. I understand its value, but I'm hoping we can come to an agreement closer to my budget. How about we aim for $800000?
I understand you're looking to stay within your budget, but I have to make sure I'm fairly compensated for the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $1100000.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I think we can find a middle ground. How about we aim for $950000?
I'm getting close to your target, Bob, but I still need to make sure I'm getting a fair price for the product. I'm willing to meet you at $980000, but I'm not going any lower than that.
I understand your position, Alice. Let's try $965000 as a compromise.
I'm willing to make one final concession, Bob. I can meet you at $975000. This is my absolute final offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
